author: Nero
install_msg: AvgFamil cog installed. Use >avgfamil to generate custom XKCD 2501 (Average Familiarity) images.
name: AvgFamil
description: Creates custom versions of XKCD 2501 (Average Familiarity) with user-provided text. Automatically wraps and scales text to fit, with dynamic height adjustment for longer text.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any user data.
